verses.name: 2 Kings 21:21
verses.text: And he walked in all the way that his father walked in, and served the idols that his father served, and worshipped them:

verses.name: 2 Kings 21:22
verses.text: And he forsook the Lord God of his fathers, and walked not in the way of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Kings 21:23
verses.text: And the servants of Amon conspired against him, and slew the king in his own house.

verses.name: 2 Kings 21:24
verses.text: And the people of the land slew all them that had conspired against king Amon; and the people of the land made Josiah his son king in his stead.
